Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Speakers media office
Onyeisi ụlo ọmeiwu nke obele bụ Yakubu Dogara kwụrụ ụgwo eji kewa ejima
Ndị dọkinta na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọọgwụ nkuzi nke mahadum Abuja kewara Ejima gbakọrọ ọnụ n'obodo gwagwalada nke dị n'Abuja ụnyaahụ.
Onye ndụ ndị dọkinta ndị a bụ Nuhu Kwajafa na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba akpọrọ Global Peace Initiatives dere maka ihe a ha mere na akara Instagram ya bụ @nuhukwaj.
Akụkọ dị mkpa n'ụtụtụ a: Nwaanyị amụọla ejima anọ na Zamfara
Ejima kpụkọtara ọnụ anwụọla na Tanzania
Anambra Flood: Nwaanyị amụọla ụmụ ejima n'ụlọ gbatagbata
Dọkinta Kwajafa dere: "Anyi chọrọ ịkwuputa ezigbo ekene anyị, ka anyị na enye Yakubu Dogara ekene ọma maka etu o si kwụọ ụgwọ eji rụọ ọrụ a."
Ikewa ejima ndị ahụ were ndị dọkinta a ọtụtụ oge.
Ebe foto si, Speakers media office
Ejima gbakọrọ ọnu
Nke a abụghị mbụ ndị dọkinta na Naịjirịa na-ekewa ejima.
N'ọnwa Juun nke afọ a, ndị dọkinta n'ụlọ ọgwụ Federal Medical Centre kewara Fatima na Maryam bụ ejima gbakọrọ ọnụ mgbe amụrụ ha.
